title: France
description: In August 2011, my family took a trip to France. Mostly Paris, but we also went to the southern coast.

photos.description: The lower half of the Eiffel Tower and an orange balloon. I like this picture a lot.
photos.alt: The lower half of the Eiffel Tower taking most of the frame and an orange balloon in the bottom right.

photos.description: Some pigeons on a bird statue.
photos.alt: Two pigeons sitting on top of a statue of an eagle on a wall.

photos.description: Notre Dame, carefully angled to avoid as much of the throng below as I could.
photos.alt: The upper portion of Notre Dame.
Two flying pigeons with clouds and sky in the background.

photos.description: Versaille, again carefully framed to appear less zoo-like.
photos.alt: The front of Versaille in the bottom of the frame with sky filling the top.

photos.description: Some fountains in the gardens of Versaille.
photos.alt: A series of synchronized fountains spraying water over a pond.

photos.description: Stained glass and a cool statue silhouette in Notre Dame.
photos.alt: Light coming through colorful stained glass behind the black silhouette of a statue.

photos.description: A rainbow reflected in a glass door. I have a couple of it near the Eiffel tower too, but it was gray and rainy so they're not that great.
photos.alt: A reflection of a rainbow in a glass door.

photos.description: A pier and beach and lighthouse somewhere in the south of France.
photos.alt: A sunny beach with a long pier in the background leading to a small lighthouse.
